data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Vasilevo, North Macedonia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vasilevo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 4 believers in Vasilevo to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Vasilevo, North Macedonia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Vasilevo, North Macedonia.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Albanian, Macedonian people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Albanian, Macedonian people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Albanian, Macedonian people is yours.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Vasilevo, North Macedonia. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, sanctify the 4 believers in Vasilevo and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Vasilevo, North Macedonia will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
